sentence: Unilever PLC ( UL ) will begin trading ex-dividend on August 02, 2017.
A cash dividend payment of $0.409 per share is scheduled to be paid on September 06, 2017.
Shareholders who purchased UL prior to the ex-dividend date are eligible for the cash dividend payment.
This represents an 8.2% increase over prior dividend payment.
At the current stock price of $56.99, the dividend yield is 2.87%.
The previous trading day's last sale of UL was $56.99, representing a -0.8% decrease from the 52 week high of $57.45 and a 47.72% increase over the 52 week low of $38.58.
UL is a part of the Basic Industries sector, which includes companies such as Procter & Gamble Company ( PG ) and Unilever NV ( UN ).
Zacks Investment Research reports UL's forecasted earnings growth in 2017 as 24.52%, compared to an industry average of 12.3%.
For more information on the declaration, record and payment dates, visit the UL Dividend History page.
Our Dividend Calendar has the full list of stocks that have an ex-dividend today.
